description: A PlantCover represents a space covered by vegetation.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the PlantCover.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the PlantCover.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the PlantCover.

properties.name: averageHeight
properties.description: Specifies the average height of the PlantCover.

properties.name: minHeight
properties.description: Specifies the minimum height of the PlantCover.

properties.name: maxHeight
properties.description: Specifies the maximum height of the PlantCover.

properties.name: lod1MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the PlantCover in Level of Detail 1. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the PlantCover in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod1MultiSolid
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSolid geometry that represents the PlantCover in Level of Detail 1. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod2MultiSolid
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSolid geometry that represents the PlantCover in Level of Detail 2. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod3MultiSolid
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSolid geometry that represents the PlantCover in Level of Detail 3. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4MultiSolid
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSolid geometry that represents the PlantCover in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.
